attributes.action: impose a time limit on none conviction information recorded on disclosures and CRB certificates.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There should be a time limit after which none conviction information recorded on disclosures and CRB certificates becomes 'spent' as in the case of criminal convictions.
The information should not be kept and recorded indefinatly as it is at present.
